alert.note: Alert for Greeley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN GREELEY COUNTY THROUGH 300 PM CDT... At 228 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Greeley, or 26 miles east of Ord. This storm is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Greeley County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
